name: Apex City Adventure
description:
You are Alton Avery. A criminal investigator for the Apex City Police. For weeks you've been tracking a serial arsonist. You're especially determined to find this criminal because they've been targeting the few family owned business that haven't been swallowed by the corporations. You received an anonymous tip online detailing their next targeted location.You are in a race a burning building to either save civilians or apprehend a serial arson. You and your Automated partner, CASE, arrive at the location only to find smoke emanating from the building. 

What will you do!?
